Sentencas: In order to optimize the electrical properties of co-doped ceria electrolytes, Ce0.8Ca0.15Sm0.05O2-delta (CCS) sintered at different temperatures (1150 degrees C, 1200 degrees C, 1250 degrees C, 1300 degrees C and 1350 degrees C for 8 h) have been prepared and systematically investigated.
Titulo: Electrical properties optimization of calcium Co-doping system: CeO2-Sm2O3

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of CCS increases with the increase of sintering temperatures, and the 1250 degrees C-sintered sample presents the highest conductivity because of the best microstructures.
Titulo: Electrical properties optimization of calcium Co-doping system: CeO2-Sm2O3

Sentencas: However, the electrical conductivity of CCS decreases when the sintering temperatures goes beyond 1250 degrees C. We attribute this to the phase instability.
Titulo: Electrical properties optimization of calcium Co-doping system: CeO2-Sm2O3

Sentencas: It reveals that microstructures and the phase stability have important effects on the optimization of electrical properties for the co-doped ceria electrolytes.
